text: This can be done via a workflow
“Send an internal email”
Anyone else ever had a currently active template not show up as an option in the blog listing / post template selectors in "content settings" ?
I've got a template that is being used (and that I need to use again) that isn't even showing up as an option!
I’ve only had that happen if I had the content settings pane open before I published the template, just needed to refresh(that one’s more a user error than HS issue)
Yeah, no I've dealt with that one before -- This is more of "The template exists, has existed, and is used for dozens of blogs but now it can't be used for any new ones"
I also tried cloning it to see if a NEW file / template would work and still no dice (even after refreshing content settings)
very odd. is the site using the new design manager or old?
sorry more specifically is that template new design manager or old
It's DM2
I can't go back to DM1... don't make me lol

Forgive me for this stupid question, but to help troubleshoot I have to ask, are you certain that the template is actually a blog template and not a page template with blog content added in?

The new design manager isn’t always perfectly clear in that regard.

Again sorry for the stupid question.
Hey Ian, did you ever figure this out? just curious

Yes it is - as I mentioned, it's literally ALREADY in use with a dozen + other blogs lol. I just got off the phone (had to leave so didn't resolve) with HS support and the tech COULD see the template on her end. Obviously we ran through the "have you cleared cookies" bit and switched browsers but still couldn't see it
will update on the resolution in an hour after I have another call with them

<@U4RP6AGV9> I think it’s some growing/transition pains with DM2. We had something similar happen with a ghost file and the HS devs had to fix it. It wouldn’t show up in the design manager unless you searched for it, and then cloning to portals wasn’t an option. It also didn’t show up in ftp. Some weird stuff has for sure. But DM2 is a lot better nevertheless. Good luck
Thanks <@U3T21PDBK> - I expect as much with it being in beta. Just hoping for a quick resolution. Amen to DM2 being a big improvement
<@U7SL518D6> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U7SL518D6/FA7CE3DNF/tenor.gif|Tech Support>
is there a beta for the Customer Hub at all?
what is meant by the “customer hub”?
<https://blog.HubSpot.com/service/customer-experience-software?_ga=2.118127243.365314090.1523887757-1027694789.1492110215>
this is probably better to read: <https://offers.HubSpot.com/service-hub-beta>
basically their answer to a zendesk type solution for customers
